name: Vosar
description:
Vosar - A game in which you run away from monsters and tentacles, and most importantly, turn around in time. This is my second game, don't judge too harshly :3 Thanks for the graphics and music:

Chiphead64

Free Game Assets

Monicaparroyo

Control: AD-Running  Mouse-Direction.

The game was produced from 08/30/22 to 09/02/22.
